name: EnvyNotifs – All-in-One Notification Management
author: EnvyTheme

sections.description:
EnvyNotifs is a WordPress Notification/Alert/Countdown/Headline bar plugin that allows you to create unlimited notification bars to notify your customers. This plugin has the options to add position, unlimited colors, background colors, date, time, countdown, shape, icons to make your notification bar more attractive & professional.

Notification Management

Position Options

  • Select Notification Position
  • Where you want to show?
  • Hide/Show on mobile devices

Date/Time Options

  • Start date for notice
  • End date for notice
  • Start time for notice
  • End time for notice

Content Options

  • Notice Countdown
  • Notice Marquee Scrolling
  • Notice Font Size
  • Notice Font Weight
  • Button Text
  • Button Border Radius
  • Icon Font Size
  • Icon Class
  • Icon Border Radius

Color Options

  • Notifs Bar Background Color
  • Notifs Bar Font Color
  • Notifs Button Background Color
  • Notifs Button Background Hover Color
  • Notifs Button Font Color
  • Notifs Button Font Hover Color
  • Notifs Close Icon Background Color
  • Notifs Close Icon Background Hover Color
  • Notifs Close Icon Font Color
  • Notifs Close Icon Font Hover Color

Documentation and Support

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum
sections.installation:
From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “EnvyNotifs”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload envy-notifs folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
